name: Hygge
description:
This is an illustration I did the week before I joined Figma. I was traveling around Europe, and the "hygge" aesthetic I encountered in Copenhagen really stuck with me. 

It's also the first illustration I've made in Figma. I've (hopefully) gotten better since I've joined, but thought it'd be fun to share. 

I ended up flattening a lot of the masks and boolean ops shapes, so I think I'll eventually update this with a HOWTO if people are interested!
